title: BBC will use Information to contact users about policy changes

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
tosdr.tldr:
BBCs Privacy and Cookies Policy states it will use Personal Information to contact users about policy changes

Point 7 in the Privacy and Cookies Policy:
7. When will the BBC use my information to contact me?
We might use your information to contact you about different things, like:
to update you on any changes to the BBC’s policies, practices and Terms of Use
